Docs.summary: Specifies the number of stop bits used on the object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You use this enumeration when setting the value of the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> property on the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class. Stop bits separate each unit of data on an asynchronous serial connection. They are also sent continuously when no data is available for transmission.
The <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort> class throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> exception when you set the <xref:System.IO.Ports.SerialPort.StopBits%2A> property to None.
